languages.text: "Леди-Навигатор... слов нет, чтобы описать, как я рад тому, что вы уцелели".
"Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."
languages.original_text: "Леди-Навигатор... слов нет, чтобы описать, как я рад тому, что вы уцелели".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “导航者女士……你还活着，我心中的喜悦无法用言语表达。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

traits.locale_text: “导航者女士……你还活着，我心中的喜悦无法用言语表达。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Dame navigatrice... Je ne saurais vous exprimer à quel point je suis soulagé que vous ayez survécu. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

traits.locale_text: « Dame navigatrice... Je ne saurais vous exprimer à quel point je suis soulagé que vous ayez survécu. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lady Navegante... no tengo palabras para describir mi alegría al ver que aún vive».
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Navegante... no tengo palabras para describir mi alegría al ver que aún vive».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「航宙士殿…あなたが生きている、この喜びは言い表せません」
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙士殿…あなたが生きている、この喜びは言い表せません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lady Navigator ... ich kann nicht in Worte fassen, wie glücklich ich bin, dass Ihr überlebt habt."
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator ... ich kann nicht in Worte fassen, wie glücklich ich bin, dass Ihr überlebt habt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

languages.text: "Leydi Rotacı... Yaşıyor olmana ne kadar sevindiğimi anlatamam."
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator... there are no words to describe how glad I am that you survived."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Rotacı... Yaşıyor olmanıza ne kadar sevindiğimi anlatamam."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
